EmailTemplate.description: Template Used to Notify EMail Requester that WR Received
EmailTemplate.name: WR EMail Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Request # {!smWork_Order__c.Name} was received by Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!smWork_Order__c.RequesterEmail__c},
Work Request # {!smWork_Order__c.Name} was received by Email.
Description: {!smWork_Order__c.Description__c}
The Work Request will be reviewed for approval. Should additional information be required, you will be contact you by email or phone.
Thank you.
